user.description: Enter the details of your Overseerr instance to set up the integration. API key can be optionally provided for enhanced access.

reauth_confirm.title: [%key:common::config_flow::title::reauth%]
reauth_confirm.description: Your Overseerr integration needs reauthorization. Please confirm to re-authenticate.

error.overseerr_error: Failed to connect to Overseerr. Please check your settings.
